banner.headline: THE WORLDâ€™S BEST FOR EXCEPTIONAL SCANNING SOLUTIONS
banner.sublineText: With over 10 years of experience in photogrammetry, botspot helps you realize your vision with an unmatched level of adaptability.

mainBlock.headline: Our services go beyond the simple act of ownership, exploring ways of collaboration and flexibility.

first.headline: In-House Scanning
first.text:
Visit our office for an in-person scan, or send your items to us,
and our skilled team will capture and deliver detailed 3D models
tailored to your requirements.

second.headline: Collaboration Services
second.text:
Comprehensive support to enhance your projects, including expert
consulting and flexible short-term or long-term rental solutions
based on your needs.
